entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Rain showers beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening then northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers. Fog. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers. Fog. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016
